entry.title: LUXURY ORGANIC ROSE DIAMOND LIP EXFOLIATOR
entry.summary:
Vendor: HENNÉ
Type: Makeup
Price: 22.00

Description

A complete 5-star experience to luxury lip care is complete with the Rose Diamond Lip Exfoliator. Henné has maintained it's high level of certified organic and luxurious standards with this step one in a two step at-home spa treatment, complete with the LUXURY ORGANIC LIP BALM for the most exquisite, soft, vibrant and lip plumping results. 

USDA CERTIFIED ORGANIC
For external use only.
Store in a cool, dry place
Not tested on animals
Made in the USA
10ml | 0.35 fl oz

Our Beauty Notes: All we can is YES, YES! Part one to a complete lip luxury power duo is here. It's incredibly luxurious, gritty yet soft and deeply moisturizing lip exfoliator preps your lips without stripping them and prepping them for complete gorgeousness. 

Directions

Apply liberally on damp lips, exfoliating the area for one to two minutes and gently rinse. End with Henné Luxury Lip Balm for (the most) incredible results. 

Ingredients

Organic Cane Sugar, Organic Coconut Oil, Organic Beeswax, Organic Shea Butter, Organic Vanilla Flavoring, Organic Jojoba Oil, Organic Vitamin E Oil (Non-GMO), Organic Aronia Powder and Organic Rose Essential Oil.

entry.title: Agent Nateur N°4 Holi(Rose) Deodorant
entry.summary:
Vendor: AGENT NATEUR
Type: Bath + Body
Price: 24.00

Description 

h o l i ( r o s e )
N°4 d e o d o r a n t

Brand Seen In: VOGUE, Well+GOOD, InStyle Magazine, Byrdie + More
"HANDS DOWN...THE BEST NATURAL DEODORANT ON THE MARKET" - VOGUE.COM
 

SENSUAL and exotic blend of sacred sandalwood and heart opening rose. The smell is intoxicating and healing, while sandalwood is a pheromone it also acts as a natural deodorant, while the Number 4 derives its meaning from creation and it represents patience, trust, honesty and integrity. This beauty vibrates with passion, drive and mastery.

Both Shiva Rose and Agent Nateur perfected the deodorant for six months to release this beautiful scent and luxurious packaging as the perfect extension to an already cult-worthy brand. The premise of AGENT NATEUR d e o d o r a n t s are they formulated with only the finest ingredients including organic coconut oil, beeswax, sodium bicarbonate, avocado butter, sunflower butter, castor oil, raw organic honey and healing essential oils. The fragrance is beautiful and most importantly, AGENT NATEUR N°4  d e o d o r a n t  WORKS!

Our Beauty Notes: This is the most luxurious deodorant we've found, that's healthy and works effectively now with a stunning, subtly seductive scent. We tested the original through through Barre class, spin class and throughout the summer months to ensure that our LeVert Beauties get what we promise - effective, clean, luxury. This delivers the same effective power as the original with a lovely new, luxurious scent of rose and sandalwood. OUR TIP: People (us to!) sometimes have the tendency to add more product when somethings labeled "natural" and with this deodorant it's important to begin with less until you discover your balance to keep your clothes dry and deodorant free.  

Handmade in West Hollywood, Bottles Made in London. Large 1.7 oz

Ingredients

Ingredients: Organic coconut oil, sodium bicarbonate, beeswax, sunflower butter, avocado butter, castor oil, rose essential oil, sandalwood essential oil, love

  • Agent Nateur products are created with non-gmo, pesticide-free, food-grade ingredients available in order to be safe for those with even the most sensitive skin. If you have a history of sensitive skin or allergic reactions, please be sure to test body products on a small area inside your wrist for 2-3 days prior to using. Agent Nateur cannot guarantee that customers will not experience skin reactions to their products and cannot be held responsible should any occur.  If you are sensitive to baking soda, we recommend that you try an apple cider vinegar wash prior to using our deodorant.  Apply apple cider vinegar and warm water to a towel and wash your underarms before applying to equal out skins pH.
HOW TO USE 

A little goes a long way....you don't need much of Agent Nateur to keep you smelling luxurious throughout the day. Give yourself one month to transition from antiperspirant to this natural deodorant if you develop a rash. Sometimes irritation is a sign that the body is detoxing from the aluminum in antiperspirant and other times it's a sign that your body's PH is too high for the baking soda in the deodorant. Shave the night before applying it if your skin is sensitive and begin by applying to clean skin.

entry.title: LUXURY ORGANIC LIP BALM
entry.summary:
Vendor: HENNÉ
Type: Makeup
Price: 22.00

Description

Experience luxury every day with this 100% natural and moisturizing organic lip balm. Carefully chosen with the most nourishing and luxurious ingredients to ensure you get everything your lips need and not a thing more. 

USDA CERTIFIED ORGANIC
For external use only.
Store in a cool, dry place
Not tested on animals
Made in the USA
10ml | 0.35 fl oz

Our Beauty Notes: Can a lip balm really be that game-changing? YUP. Hennè created the most luxurious lip balm that your lips won't crave - but you will. You'll never have healthier, more properly moisturized or better looking lips then after experiencing this everyday lip balm. 

Directions

Apply liberally on the lips for maximum benefits. Also suitable for use on dry areas such as hands, elbows, nose, heels and anywhere else that requires additional moisture. 

Ingredients

Organic Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Organic Cera Alba (Beeswax), Organic Persea Americana (Avocado) Oil, Organic Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter) Fruit, Organic Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Organic Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Tocopherol (Vitamin E).

entry.title: All-Natural Eyelash Enhancing Serum
entry.summary:
Vendor: PLUME
Type: Makeup
Price: 95.00

Description  

This clinically tested eyelash and brow enhancer just won us over.

This proprietary formula is designed to have a duel effect on the appearance of your lashes and brows: 1st by supporting the health and hydration of each hair follicle & 2nd by supporting the longevity of those hair follicles allowing your lashes to grow longer and last longer before naturally falling out. 

When it comes to the health, hydration and longevity of all living organisms (like the hair cells in your lashes) nothing compares to the effectiveness and purity of plant-derived ingredients. Similar to juicing fresh fruits and vegetables, think of Plume as a botanical super-juice for the hair follicles of your lashes and brows. 

95% reported increased length and/or density

View Before & After Tab from customers (more to come).

This delivers longer lashes in just weeks and is FREE FROM...

  • Parabens

  • Sulfates

  • Phthalates

  • Hormones and Prostaglandins

  • Artificial fragrances

  • Artificial dyes

  • Gluten

  • Synthetic ingredients of any kind 

Safe and Gentle on Sensitive Eyes

Two Ingredients with 'chemical-sounding' names explained:

Sucrose Laurate: Emulsifier, naturally obtained from hydrogenation and esterification of sugar cane and vegetable oil.

Sodium Stearoyl Lactylate: A natural, food grade, emulsifier derived from stearic acid (plant-derived) and the sodium salt of lactic acid.

In addition to their plant-derived active ingredients, they use only plant-derived emulsifiers and stabilizers as well; meaning their product stays 100% natural across its entire formulation. The type and quality of non-active ingredients used in a cosmetic product (emulsifiers, thickeners, surfactants) are often overlooked, however, they can have a significant impact on how well the overall formula performs!

THINK DIRTY APP SCORE = 0 

Think Dirty App Score Is = 0 as (0-3) are products that do not contain any ingredients which have a documented potential negative health impact. 

Our Beauty Notes: We are constantly on the hunt for clean innovation, we were humbly surprised by the ingredients and the effective nature of this lash enhancing product. We admire Lauren, the founder's vision for the merriment of clean, effective beauty and health. This is a staple in our Beauty Bag. 

Size: .17 fl oz/5 ml

 

Ingredients 

Organic Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Organic Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Tussilago Farfara (Coltsfoot) Flower Extract, Achillea Millefolium (Yarrow) Extract, Cinchona Succirubra Bark Extract, Water, Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E), Glycerin, Honey Extract, Prunus Amygdalus (Sweet Almond) Oil, Sucrose Laurate, Sodium Stearoyl Lactylate, Nasturtium Officinale (Watercress) Extract, Tropaeolium Majus (Indian Cress) Extract, Xanthan Gum, Coleus Forskohlii Root Oil, Carya Ovata (Hickory) Bark Extract.

Organic Aloe Vera: Rich in vitamins and minerals, aloe vera has long been recognized for its moisturizing, healing, anti-bacterial and anti-fungal properties.

Organic Castor Oil: Nourishes hair follicles with omega fatty acids, vitamin E and proteins. Castor oil is known to have anti-bacterial and anti-fungal properties thus protecting the area around your eyes from harmful micro-organisms and potential infection.

Vitamin E: A potent anti-oxidant and effective moisturizer.Honey Extract: Exhibits natural moisturizing properties, fortifies hair and skin with vitamins and minerals, and increases blood circulation for optimal health around the eye region.

Honey Extract:  A powerful humectant, hair follicles treated with honey extract retain more moisture. Also known for its anti-irritant and anti-microbial characteristics.

Watercress (Nasturtium officinale) and Indian cress (Tropaeolum majus) have been rigorously studied to show that these extracts can help hair produce keratin, a key factor in the strength, and ultimately length, of your hair.

Coltsfoot flower (Tussilago farfara), yarrow flower (Achillea millefolium), and Peruvian quina bark (Cinchona succirubra) combine to help stimulate cell renewal, feeding the proteic metabolism of hair and working against oxidative stress. The result: a powerful way to promote the longevity of your lash and brow follicles.

Hair, including eyelashes and eyebrows, is made up of 90% keratin. The minerals that are abundant within our proprietary blend, such as zinc and magnesium, have been shown in clinical studies to help hair produce a higher quality of keratin. This translates into stronger follicles in your lashes and brows.

And eyelashes that have a longer life have more time to grow longer!

Use

Shake well and apply nightly to clean upper and lower eyelash line, brows if desired.  

Before & After

entry.title: CoQ-10 Toner
entry.summary:
Vendor: Indie Lee
Type: Skincare
Price: 32.00

Description
Brand Seen In: Cosmopolitan, Vogue, Refinery29, Zoe Report, Today Show, Lucky, Marie Claire, Allure, Style, Glamour, ELLE, Bazaar & More 

"Certified Chic" - Vogue 

"The Most Inspiring Beauty Brand Ever" - Cosmopolitan Magazine 

An alcohol free, skin-balancing toner formulated with the powerful antioxidant CoQ-10. The hydrating and refreshing mixture helps close pores and balance the skin's pH level using Aloe Vera and Hyaluronic Acid to enhance younger, more vibrant, and even-toned skin. 

Our Beauty Notes: Toners are an essential part of your skincare regime for revived and balanced skin, this helps to restore your skins unique and personal pH without the burning of alcohol. Plus, this 4 ounce bottle can last up to 6 months deepening on daily use. 

Indie Lee tugged at our heart strings initially with her story of overcoming a brain tumor to discover the link between conventional beauty and its potential health harm. After learning about her story, she then struck us with a genius product line that conquers disbelieve in clean beauty. Since regaining her health, she has taken the clean beauty world by storm creating the chic, effective and modern (right up our alley!): Indie Lee. 

Ingredients 

Purified Water, Decyl Glucoside (Veg. Oils & Sugar), Disodium Coco-Glucoside Citrate, Coco Glucoside Oleaste (Coconut and Sunflower Oil), Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein*, Xanthan Gum, Fragaria Chiloensis Seed Oil (Strawberry), Lycopene, Phenoxyethanol and Ethylhexylglycerin (both derived from natural sources).  *Note: contains gluten. 

Use

Apply a small amount of cleanser to wet face. Use with a wet cotton pad to remove eye makeup. Rinse completely with water. Follow with toner and moisturizer. For external use only.

Also removes your makeup in the same step: It gently removes makeup without stripping the skin of necessary nutrients. It’s also a great formula for cleaning makeup brushes!  4 oz.   

    Our Beauty Notes: This favorite Indie Lee Cleanser is simple yet effective in skincare multitasking, its gel-like cleanser tackles stubborn eye makeup with one pump, while two pumps rid an entire face of makeup and dirt. With the ability to work as an exfoliator if left on to "sit" on the skin and smells like the things dreams are made off. Clear, bright and younger looking skin is in your future.

entry.title: Coconut Citrus Body Scrub
entry.summary:
Vendor: Indie Lee
Type: Bath + Body
Price: 38.00

Description
Brand Seen In: Cosmopolitan, Vogue, Refinery29, Zoe Report, Today Show, Lucky, Marie Claire, Allure, Style, Glamour, ELLE, Bazaar & More 

"Certified Chic" - Vogue 

"The Most Inspiring Beauty Brand Ever" - Cosmopolitan Magazine 

"Ladies, the secret to smooth, sexy skin this summer is the perfect scrub. I'm obsessed with this one! It has a phenomonal coconut-citrus smell and will really slough off that dry skin of yours. Have I mentioned that the fresh, beachy smell will transport your sense to a tropical paradise? Believe me, your skin will feel so baby-soft straight out of the shower!" - Model & Actress, Molly Sims  

"Lee created the Coconut Citrus scrub to relieve skin dryness caused by chemotherapy - it's that gentle." - Martha Stewart 

This beloved body scrub is an intoxicating and all-natural blend of coconut, lemongrass, lemon balm, jojoba and vanilla. Blissfully buff skin to it’s smoothest with the gentle sugar texture which expertly exfoliates to leave skin silky soft and supple. Perfect for year round use.Best used on body and lips (but please resist the urge to taste!). Non-irritating formula great for all skin types. 8oz. 

    Our Beauty Notes: The smell, the feeling, the results - divine! 

    Indie Lee tugged at our heart strings initially with her story of overcoming a brain tumor to discover the link between conventional beauty and its potential health harm. After learning about her story, she then struck us with a genius product line that conquers disbelieve in clean beauty. Since regaining her health, she has taken the clean beauty world by storm creating the chic, effective and modern (right up our alley!): Indie Lee. 

    Note: During shipping your scrub may harden in cold temperatures and melt in hot temperatures. That is normal.  Before first use, allow it to sit at room temperature for a few hours.  After opening, mix scrub with a scoop or spoon before use. 

    Ingredients 

    Saccharum Officinarum (sugarcane), Coco Nucifera (coconut) Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (jojoba) Oil, Melissa Officinalis (lemon balm), Cymbopogon Citratus (lemongrass) and Vanilla Planifolia (vanilla).

    Use

    Soften sugar scrub with the steam of the shower, then simply scoop desired amount and massage onto skin. Best used weekly, prior to shaving. Rinse with warm water after use and store at room temperature to prevent hardening.

Long Wear Shade

ILIA Tinted Lip Conditioner combines organic ingredients to soothe and condition the lips. Each shade carries a sheer touch of color that increases in intensity when applied liberally. Mix with other ILIA colors to create your own personalized shade.

0.14oz / 4g

Ingredients 
Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil*, Jojoba (Simmondsia Chinensis) Seed Oil*, Beeswax (Cera Alba)*, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax, Sesamum Indicum (Seasame) Seed Oil*, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter*, Tocopheryl Acetate (Natural Vitamin E), Pomegranate (Punica Granatum) Seed Extract, Grape (Vitis Vinifera) Seed Extract, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Fruit Oil, Jasminum Officinale (Jasmine) Oil, Vanilla Planifolia Fruit Oil. May Contain: Mica, Titanium Dixoide, Iron Oxide (CI 77499, CI 77492, CI 77491), Red 7 CI15850, Red 28 CI45410, Yellow 5 CI19140. *Certified Organic Ingredients. Ingrédients Certifiés Biologiques.

entry.title: Fade Into You (Translucent Powder)
entry.summary:
Vendor: ILIA
Type: Makeup
Price: 34.00

Description 

Brand Seen in: Vogue, Glamour, Cosmopolitan & Many More

Soft to the touch, Fade Into You is a light universal finishing powder, to hide shine and act as your no-color finishing powder, packaged in a refillable brush component. 

The translucent base is a blend of organic powder and oils including Aloe Leaf Extract, full of minerals and vitamins to help keep skin looking soft and supple. Passion Fruit and Rosemary Oil contain anti-inflammatory properties to help soothe the skin.

0.14oz / 4 g

Our Beauty Notes: An everyday staple in our beauty routine to hold make-ups lasting power, diminish T-zone shine and help skin looked 'photoshopped' soft, while significaltly diminishing pore size. Side note: The first application requires vigorous shaking to get powder to the surface - some serious muscle, you've got this! 

Ingredients 
  • Zea Mays (Corn) Starch*, Mica, Silica, Bambusa Arundinacea Stem Extract, Zinc Stearate, Passiflora Incarnata (Passionfruit) Steam/Leaf, Rosemary (Rosmarinus Officinalis) Leaf*, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil*, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Tocopherol, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Powder*, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate. *Certified Organic Ingredients. Ingrédients Certifiés Biologiques.

    This ingredient list is subject to change, it is the most up-to-date ingredient list and may differ from product packaging.

Description 

Brand Seen in: Vogue, Glamour, Cosmopolitan & Many More

ILIA's Vivid Foundation is a buildable light to full coverage foundation created for all skin types, including sensitive skin. The soft whipped formula is filled with healing botanicals to help calm and revitalize the skin. 

SANTORINI | F3: For light to medium skin with neutral undertones

The six new Foundation shades range from light to dark and are named to match sand colors from various deserts from around the world.

1oz/ 30g

Our Beauty Notes: We were hooked by this semi-matte coverage thanks to its whipped consistency that works into the skin beautifully and drys to a powder-like finish. This works at evening out skin tone and offering long-lasting power. The moisturizing properties aid in long-lasting hydration and simulate a tightening of the skin all while combating free radicals. 

Ingredients 

Water (Aqua), Glycerin, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil*, Polyglyceryl-2 Oleate, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Polyglyceryl-2 Stearate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil*, Rosa Canina (Rose Hip) Fruit Oil*, Behenyl Olivate, Pistacia Lentiscus Gum, Pistacia Lentiscus (Mastic) Gum, Lecithin, Caprylic/capric Triglyceride, Jasminum Officinale (Jasmine) Flower/leaf Extract, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Flower/leaf/steam Extract, Eugenia Caryophyllus (Clove) Flower Extract, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Fruit Extract, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Fruit Oil, Vaccinium Macrocarpon (Cranberry) Seed Oil, Alcohol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Tocopherol, Allantoin, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenethyl Alcohol. May Contain: Mica, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxide (Ci77491, Ci77492, Ci77499). *certified Organic Ingredients. Ingrédients Certifiés Biologiques.

Designed for all skin types, this lightweight finishing powder gives a soft-focus look to the skin with a natural, translucent finish that is subtle to the eye. With a blend of organic powder and oils, this talc-free formula helps keep the skin nourished, looking soft, and helps to reduce shine.

Ideal used with Finishing Powder Brush

0.32oz / 9 g

Our Beauty Notes: An everyday staple in our beauty routine to hold make-ups lasting power, diminish T-zone shine and help skin looked 'photoshopped' soft, while significaltly diminishing pore size. Plus, in the NEW (and exciting) jar version is perfect for our everyday makeup bag. 

Ingredients 
  • Zea Mays (Corn) Starch*, Mica, Silica, Bambusa Arundinacea Stem Extract, Zinc Stearate, Passiflora Incarnata (Passionfruit) Steam/Leaf, Rosemary (Rosmarinus Officinalis) Leaf*, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil*, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Tocopherol, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Powder*, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate. *Certified Organic Ingredients. Ingrédients Certifiés Biologiques.

The NEW Finishing Powder Brush is designed with an angled dome shape to help push the powder into the skin instead of just sitting on the surface, as well as get into the nooks and cranny's of the face. 

Designed in the iconic ILIA finish, this brush’s soft bristles are made with high-grade, synthetic Taklon, an easy-to-clean, cruelty-free material. Wash brush with mild soap and warm water regularly. Designed for Fade Into You (Translucent Powder)

entry.title: Agent Nateur N°3 Deodorant
entry.summary:
Vendor: AGENT NATEUR
Type: Bath + Body
Price: 21.00

Description 

h o l i ( s t i c k )
N°3 d e o d o r a n t

As Seen In: VOGUE, Well+GOOD, InStyle Magazine + More

Glamour Magazine's 'BEST In BEAUTY' 2016 

"HANDS DOWN...THE BEST NATURAL DEODORANT ON THE MARKET" - VOGUE.COM

"The Best (Natural Deodorant) I've Found is Agent Nateur" - Emma Watson, Actress

This large h o l i ( s t i c k ) deodorant will keep you smelling lovely well into the evening hours with a light trace of honey, lavender and eucalyptus. 

AGENT NATEUR N ° 3  d e o d o r a n t  is formulated with only the finest ingredients including organic cocounut oil, beeswax, sodium bicarbonate, avocado butter, sunflower butter, castor oil, raw organic honey and healing essential oils. The fragrance is beautiful and most importantly, AGENT NATEUR N°3  d e o d o r a n t  WORKS! 

Handmade in West Hollywood, Bottles Made in London

Large 1.7 oz

Our Beauty Notes: This is the most luxurious deodorant we've found, that's healthy and works effectively. We tested this through Barre class, spin class and throughout the summer months to ensure that our LeVert Beauties get what we promise - effective, clean, luxury. OUR TIP: People (us to!) sometimes have the tendency to add more product when somethings labeled "natural" and with this deodorant it's important to begin with less until you discover your balance to keep your clothes dry and deodorant free.  

Ingredients

Ingredients: Organic coconut oil, sodium bicarbonate, beeswax, sunflower butter, avocado butter, castor oil, raw organic honey, lavender essential oil, hydrogen peroxide, eucalyptus oil, love

HOW TO USE 

A little goes a long way....you don't need much of Agent Nateur to keep you smelling luxurious throughout the day. Give yourself one month to transition from antiperspirant to this natural deodorant if you develop a rash. Sometimes irritation is a sign that the body is detoxing from the aluminum in antiperspirant and other times it's a sign that your body's PH is too high for the baking soda in the deodorant. Shave the night before applying it if your skin is sensitive and begin by applying to clean skin.

entry.title: Defining Wax in Marilyn
entry.summary:
Vendor: EcoBrow
Type: Makeup
Price: 26.00 - 46.55 (2 variants)

Description
Brand Seen In: Vogue, ELLE, Glamour, InStyle & More 

Bundle Marilyn & Brush Above to Save 5% 

Celebrity Brow Artist Marco Ochoa created EcoBrow Defining Wax as a 100% natural, lightweight, and smudge-proof coloring wax that allows you to achieve beautiful full brow effects.

For Marilyn Think: Gwen Stefani, Meryl Streep and Kate Hudson

Suggested for: light brown, golden, ash, strawberry, and grey hair.

This true, fleshy taupe with a hint of gold will not turn red or orange and provides soft, natural definition for fair-skinned brunettes and women with all shades of blonde hair. Quite simply, Marilyn is a blonde’s best friend.

- 100% Natural
- Mineral-based
- Paraben-free
- With Vitamin E
- Never tested on animals
- 3.4 grams
- Made in USA

      Our Beauty Notes: Typically skip brow color? Don't! Most brows naturally have bald spots and can actually age you when they're too small or not properly "full" or filled in. Start with a small amount (err less is more) and build-up color with this colored wax, which gives a the most natural application over brow powder or pencils. You can thank us later. 

      Use

      Using the EcoBrow Defining Brush, lightly dab the angle side of the brush with wax and apply onto brows using short hair-like strokes. Apply more as needed. Then use the spooley side to brush brows upward and blend wax perfectly. 

      Ingredients 

      Ingredients: neopentyl glycol diheptamate, silica, cetyl acetate, acetylated lanolin oil, ceresin, polyethylene cera microcristallina (microcrystalline wax), nylon-12, cetyl recinolente, dimethicone, natural fragrance, tocopherol (vitamin e). May Contain (+/): Iron Oxides (CI77491/77492/CI77499), Titanium Dioxide (CI77891).

entry.title: Gardenia + Tea Antioxidant Body Serum
entry.summary:
Vendor: One Love Organics
Type: Bath + Body
Price: 39.00

Description

AWARD WINNING BRAND SEEN IN:

InStyle, Vogue, ELLE, Allure, Glamour & More

With each decadent mist, Gardenia + Tea Antioxidant Body Serum intensely nourishes, hydrates and promotes firmer, smoother and more supple skin. This formula features clinically proven Antileukine 6®, an antioxidant powerhouse, to help defend against environmental stressors and elemental dryness. Ultra-light and easily absorbed, Gardenia + Tea Body Serum can be used alone or layered with your favorite sunscreen or lotion for an intensely hydrating treatment.

Our Beauty Notes: Body serum? Yes, an absolute must. This divine body oil is wrapped up in an exquisite package. Works to deeply hydrate young to mature skin working to promote firmer more subtle skin and overall glow. A very unique, quality ingredient is the Antileukine 6® that protects and stimulates collagen, reinforces the lipid barrier of the skin and neutralizes UVB stress and decreases skin inflammation. You’re able to cover generous amounts of skin with one single spray as this goes on like an oil, dries quickly and smells incredibly feminine. It’s designed for every age and we can’t seem to put it down especially thanks to its genius packaging and sprayer 'lock and unlock' click option making it perfect for traveling and/or gym bags - no spills!  

Directions 

Apply to damp skin post-bath or shower to seal in moisture for extra smooth and beautifully scented skin.

Ingredients

Pumpkin Seed Oil: a natural source of salicylic acid, to lightly exfoliate, refine and smooth the appearance of skin.

Supercritical Sea Buckthorn Oil: to nourish and condition skin with a generous helping of the rare and highly beneficial Omega-7.

Antileukine 6®, an antioxidant-rich sea botanical, to help defend against environmental stressors and elemental dryness and to help smooth and firm the

capric/caprylic triglyceride, helianthus annuus (sunflower) seed oil*, camellia sinensis (green tea) seed oil*, cucurbita pepo (pumpkin) seed oil*, fragrance/parfum*, laminaria ochroleuca (kelp) extract, hippophae rhamnoides (sea buckthorn) oil*, salvia hispanica (chia) seed extract* (and) rosmarinus ocinalis (rosemary) leaf extract*, calendula ocinalis flower extract*, aspalathus linearis (rooibos tea) extract*, limnanthes alba (meadowfoam) seed oil *Ingredients from Organic Farming

entry.title: Skin Savior Multi-Tasking Wonder Balm
entry.summary:
Vendor: One Love Organics
Type: Skincare
Price: 49.00

Description

AWARD WINNING BRAND SEEN IN:

InStyle, Vogue, ELLE, Allure, Glamour & More

Best in Beauty Award by Byrdie, 2015

Let simplicity reign in your life and on your skin. Why complicate your day juggling products when one wonder answers all calls? The ultimate multi-tasker, Skin Savior removes dirt and makeup without stripping the skin, moisturizes, illuminates and even turns mineral powder into a glowing foundation treatment. With an antioxidant-rich blend of organic coconut oil, mango butter, jojoba and chia, this citrus and vanilla treat is the perfect solution for just about any of your skin's needs. 

Our Beauty Notes: A true go-getter. Cleansing balms are all the rage for good reason, they double as a cleanser and a hydrator ridding your face of impurities taking with it traces of makeup and dirt without stripping your face. To dig deeper, this has the potential to act as a cleanser, a moisturizer, to a custom makeup treatment when paired with mineral foundation (amazing). We appreciate how a little goes a long way and we love how acne-prone, red and inflamed skin can use this just as easily as those with normal or sensitive skin. Follow the directions closely and you’ll quickly see why this is a beauty industry favorite. This is also our secret weapon for combatting air travel skin dehydration issues!  

Directions & Tips

TO CLEANSE 

Warm a small amount in your hands and gently massage onto dry skin. Remove with a warm, damp cloth.

TO MOISTURIZE 

Warm a 1/2 pea-sized amount in your hands and apply to damp skin. A little goes a loooong way.

FOR CUSTOM TREATMENT FOUNDATION

Sprinkle your favorite mineral powder into a small amount of Skin Savior. Blend together with your finger or make up brush. Add more minerals for heavier coverage. Mix colors for a custom color match. Apply to your skin for a smooth, dewy look.

Ingredients

cocos nucifera (virgin coconut) oil*, glycine soja (sweet soy) seed oil*, cera alba (beeswax)*, simmondsia chinesis (jojoba) seed oil*, jojoba esters, citrus aurantium dulcis (orange) peel wax, mangifera indica (mango) seed butter*, salvia hispanica (chia) seed extract (and) rosmarinus officinalis (rosemary) leaf extract*, avena sativa (oat kernel oil), limnanthes alba (meadowfoam) seed oil, tocopherol, vanilla planifolia fruit extract*

*Ingredients from Organic Farming

entry.title: Vitamin B Enzyme CLEANSING OIL + MAKEUP REMOVER (Original Award-Winning Version)
entry.summary:
Vendor: One Love Organics
Type: Skincare
Price: 42.00

Description

AWARD WINNING BRAND SEEN IN:

InStyle, Vogue, ELLE, Allure, Glamour & More

AWARDED BEST IN BEAUTY, GLAMOUR 2016

The Original Award-Winning Formula! 

The ultimate in multi-tasking luxury, Vitamin B Enzyme Cleansing Oil + Makeup Remover effortlessly lifts away impurities and makeup while restoring skin’s natural moisture barrier and pH balance. This non-stripping, clean-rinsing formula features papain, a fruit enzyme that helps to exfoliate and soften, and a natural Vitamin B complex to detoxify and tone. Designed with dry, dehydrated skin in mind yet concentrated enough for all skin types, The Cleansing Oil is ultra-effective when used alone or as the perfect first step in any double cleansing routine. 

Our Beauty Notes: If you're skipping one critical step - this is likely it. Properly removing your makeup is essential to clear, bright skin! Because of this, this powerful 2-n-1 Cleansing Oil + Makeup Remover is life-changing. Use with a Cleansing Sponge to deeply remove makeup and dirt and rinse well before applying serums, treatments and/or moisturizers. Plus, this smells like a warm vacation in a bottle! 

Directions

Gently press pump to dispense a small amount of serum. Apply to clean, damp face and neck day and night.

Ingredients 

organic helianthus annuus (sunflower) seed oil*, caprylic/capric triglyceride, di-ppg-2 myreth-10 adipate, polyglycerol-3 beeswax, lecithin* (and) cucurbita pepo (pumpkin) seed oil* (and) papain*, carica papaya (papaya) seed oil, tocopherol, fragrance/parfum

*Ingredients from Organic Farming

entry.title: Healthy Locks Dry Shampoo Powder
entry.summary:
Vendor: One Love Organics
Type: Bath + Body
Price: 29.00

Description

AWARD WINNING BRAND SEEN IN:

InStyle, Vogue, ELLE, Allure, Glamour & More

With a unique blend of highly absorbent Georgia Kaolin Clay, hyularonic acid, and silica rich bamboo extract, Healthy Locks Dry Shampoo Powder softens, strengthens and nourishes hair between shampoos, during travel, or for an anytime pick-me-up.

Size, Large: 1.8oz 

Want Travel Size? Click Here

Our Beauty Notes: A good dry shampoo is a must. Washing your hair daily can strip it of color and necessary hydration. When using this dry shampoo we recommend beginning by sectioning your hair into three sections, adding a quarter size (depending on thickness) amount to each and add as needed for the best results. Use your fingertips to tousle the roots against the direction of growth. Brush through. You can also add it before bed with a loose bun or braid to wake-up to great "woke up this way" hair.  

Directions 

Sprinkle as needed onto your hands or apply directly to the roots of your hair. Comb or brush through. *Tip: Use Healthy Locks Dry Shampoo before bed to absorb oil overnight and wakeup with great second (or third) day hair. 

Ingredients

organic oryza sativa (rice) starch, organic zea mays (corn) starch, kaolin, sodium bicarbonate, organic tapioca starch, bambusa (bamboo) arundinacea stem extract, silica (and) sodium hyaluronate, proprietary natural and organic fragrance compounds.

entry.title: Easy Does It Balancing Gel Cleanser
entry.summary:
Vendor: One Love Organics
Type: Skincare
Price: 29.00

Description

AWARD WINNING BRAND SEEN IN: 

InStyle, Vogue, ELLE, Allure, Glamour & More

It turns out a little cleansing goes a lot farther than you think. Often times, our best efforts at clear pores clear out our skin’s natural defenses, too. With a unique combination of organic Chilean soap bark, cold-pressed apple oil and vegetable glycerin, Easy Does It lathers into a soothing, non-drying foam that cleans, softens and helps to protect face, body and hair. That’s right. Turns out those 17 different soaps and shampoos aren’t necessary after all.

Our Beauty Notes: Effective, gentle, non-drying (and non-toxic) cleansers that create suds safely are hard to come by, which is one of many reasons we can’t seem to put this down. The glycerin is an organic compound that works to address everything from acne scars, blackheads and large pores to hydration and signs of aging.  When married with the Chilean soap bark and cold-pressed apple oil this works to balance your skins pH. Pairs perfectly with One Love Organics Cleansing Heart Sponge to clean deeper, tackle unique face crevices and to ensure makeup removal. OUR TIP: Can also be used as a family shampoo and body wash thanks to its gentle nature. 

Directions

Massage onto damp skin using gentle, circular motions. Rinse thoroughly.

Ingredients 

Aqua (Water), Glycerin, Sodium Coco-Glucoside Tartrate, Sodium Hydroxypropylsulfonate Laurylglucoside Crosspolymer, Sodium Cocoyl Hydrolyzed Amaranth Protein, Sodium Cocoamphoacetate, Cocamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine, Lauryl Glucoside, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Oil, Quillaja Saponaria Bark Extract, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Sodium Hydroxypropylsulfonate Decylglucoside Crosspolymer, Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Sodium Lauryl Glucose Carboxylate, Lonicera Caprifolium (Honeysuckle) Flower Extract, Lonicera Japonica (Honeysuckle) Flower Extract

entry.title: NEW Lipstick in Love
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kjaer Weis
Type: Makeup
Price: 36.00 - 56.00 (2 variants)

Description

Brand Seen In: ELLE, Vogue, InStyle, Marie Claire & More

"Kjaer Weis will change how you think about organic makeup" - InStyle Magazine

 A spirited, red-based coral that perfect for pale to dark skin tones to awaken any look.

“When I’m working on editorial shoots, this is a favorite color when I’m going for maximum impact.” – Kirsten Kjaer Weis

Our Beauty Notes: This long anticipated lipstick by Kjaer Weis is here! We love this lipstick for its ability to drench lips in rich, hydrated, pigmented opaque color while being true to Kjaer Weis form: refillable and extremely luxe. Note: Lip Tints provide a sheer, buildable color, while the Lipsticks offer opaque color.

- A rich, velvet finish more opaque than their Lip Tints
- Moisturizing, organic ingredients like shea butter and jojoba oil are activated with the warmth of your lips, keeping them smooth and drenched in color
- As with all Kjaer Weis products, this item is refillable
- Produced in Italy
- CCPB Certified Organic
- NO artificial ingredients, such as petroleum, parabens, artificial fragrance, petrochemical emulsifiers.
- NOT tested on animals
- Gluten FREE
- This product is not vegan

 
Use

The Kjaer Weis Lipstick is activated with the warmth of your lips and can be applied directly from the tube. Lips stay moisturized with a velvety-smooth finish.

Ingredients 

Certified Organic: Of the agriculturally derived ingredients in this product, a minimum 95% comes from organic farming.

 

Contains luxurious, organic ingredients such as:

Beeswax: Nourishes and moisturizes, wonderful for drier complexions .
Jojoba Seed Oil, Sweet Almond Oil: Natural moisturizers for the lips.
Rosa Rubiginosa Seed Oil: Excellent tissue regeneration properties; fights signs of aging.
